description:
Aikawa deploys a sniper to Yuri`s location in a move to eliminate other God Candidates. It`s a battle of equals as Sniper Mask takes on the threat.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Dochira ga Kakkoii Ikikata o Suru no ka
Qui aura la vie la plus cool ?
Which Of Us Will Live a Cool Live?
どちらがカッコいい生き方をするのか
